Hi Igor,    
     
I have the following rule sequence:     
     
1) OnHost=
DecideRule - to accept anything on same hosts.     
2) NotOnHostsDecideRule=
 - to reject anything on not same hosts.     
3) OnDomainsDecideRule - to a=
ccept anything on same domains.     
4) NotOnDomainsDecideRule - to reject =
anything not on same domains.     
     
Yes, now I save to ARC only html/t=
ext files.    
     
I'm trying to do: extract only links (from html) to so=
me     
files (in this case, *.doc and *.ppt) and save only these links to =
    
the crawl.log file. 
  
In other words, I want to restrict fetching an=
d processing of all  
URIs that not end with the specified pattern.  
  
Th=
anks.  
    
Regards,  
Artem.
